author: A_Brickset_user
title: Hafu
review: Hafu is the Carving Matoran of Po-Koro on the Island of Mata Nui.Here on earth,he was availible in 2 Sets.This one and the Powerpack from a couple years ago.He has a Copy of the Euro Misprint Black Ruru.Which is cool if you are missing a black Ruru for your Collection.He is a Copper Mask winner along with his Kohlii Partner Hewkii.If you missed Hafu the First time,in the powerpack, pick him up today!I recomend it!

author: Gus_263
title: New version of hafu
review: Taller, and a cooler version. Don't very playable, but includes good colors and mask, that makes he different than the other matoran. The kohlii stick and ball(looks like a disk)can be find in any 03' matoran

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO BIONICLE (Matoran) - Hafu Review
review:
This is a nice figure to have and it's fun to play with as well.

Box/Instructions

The instruction has only 2 pages and there're no mistakes in it.

Parts

This set has 25 pieces and it was 4 USD when it was on sale. That means that the price per piece ratio was 16 cents per piece which is a really good value for this figure.

The build

The build is very nice and easy and we also don't need to worry about stickers.

The completed model

[img]http://www.klokriecher.de/gallery_pics/l/8585-1.jpg[/img]


The arms, the hands the legs and the feet can be moved and on the back of the torso is a gear which you can use to sviwel the torso to the right and/or to the left. This figure also has a hockey stick which has a puck in it which you can take out very easily. I really like this figure - even if it doesn't do much.

Summary

All in all this set is an great set and I would recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full gallery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de


Videos I made of this set:

Stopmotion

Review

author: bajadogq
title: The Greatest Matoran of All Time
review:
Hafu is a brilliant little set. He has a great color scheme and a Kolhii Stick, which can be swung back and forth by turning a knob on his back. His build is simple yet satisfying.

Pros:
- Kolhii Stick and Puck
- Swinging Feature
- IT'S HAFU!

Cons:
- Eyes are gray, not green. :(

Overall, a brilliant set.
